jasima.core.simulation

类 Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • jasima.core.simulation.Simulation

  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for a discrete event simulation. This class doesn't do much, but only maintains an event queue and manages simulation time. Additionally it offers a centralized place to initialize random number streams and to create status and debug messages.

    The typical life cycle of a simulation would be to create it, and subsequently set any parameters. Afterwards init() has to be called before the actual simulation can be performed in run(). After completing a simulation the done()-method should be called to perform clean-up, collecting simulation results, etc. As a final step usually produceResults(Map) is called to allow the simulation and all simulation components to report simulation results.

    作者:
    Torsten Hildebrandt

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明

      Public interface of event queue implementations.

      This class is used internally by schedule(double,int,Runnable).
      static class  Simulation.SimExecState 
      static class  Simulation.SimPrintMessage
      Simulation.SimPrintMessages are produced whenever print() or trace() is called during a simulation to produce status/debug messages.

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the main simulation loop. This means:
        1. taking an event from the event queue,
        2. advancing simulation time, and
        3. triggering event processing.
        A simulation is terminated if either the maximum simulation length is reached, there are no more application events in the queue, or some other code called end().
        另请参阅:
        SimEvent.isAppEvent()

      • runMainLoop

        protected void runMainLoop()

      • blockWhilePaused

        private boolean blockWhilePaused()

      • checkInitialEventTime

        private void checkInitialEventTime()

      • handleError

        protected boolean handleError(java.lang.Throwable t)
        This method is called if an unhandled exception occurs during the main of a simulation run. The implementation here just prints an appropriate message and then rethrows the Exception, terminating the simulation run.
        参数:
        t - The Error or RuntimeException that was triggered somewhere in simulation code.
        返回:
        Whether or not to rethrow the Exception after processing.

      • createErrorMsgEventInPast

        private java.lang.String createErrorMsgEventInPast(SimEvent e)

      • beforeRun

        public void beforeRun()
        Override this method to perform initializations after init(), but before running the simulation. This method is usually used to schedule initial events. It is executed automatically at the beginning of the run() method.

      • resetStats

        protected void resetStats()
        This method is called once after beforeRun() and immediately before the main simulation loop starts. It is called a second time if the simulation has a a value for statsResetTime() set.

        It should contain code to initialize statistics variables.

      • afterRun

        public void afterRun()
        Override this method to perform some action after running the simulation, but before done() is called. It is executed automatically at the end of the run() method.

      • done

        public void done()
        Performs clean-up etc., after a simulation's run() method finished.

      • performRun

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> performRun()
        Convenience method calling init(), beforeRun(), run(), afterRun(), done() and returning the results produced by produceResults(Map) in a new HashMap.
        返回:
        The results produced by the simulation and its components.

      • performRunAsync

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> performRunAsync(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pool)
        Call the performRun() method in an asynchronous way.
        参数:
        pool - The ExecutorService to use.
        返回:
        A Future to obtain the simulation results.
        另请参阅:
        performRun(), performRunAsync()

      • performRunAsync

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> performRunAsync()
        Trigger asynchronous execution of the simulation in Java's default ForkJoinPool.
        返回:
        A Future to obtain the simulation results.
        另请参阅:
        performRun(), performRunAsync(ExecutorService)

        Schedules a new event.
        参数:

      • schedule

        public void schedule(double time,
                     int prio,
                     java.lang.Runnable method)
        Schedules a call to method at a certain point in time. Instead of calling this method it is usually better to use schedule(String, double, int, Runnable) instead, as the additional description parameter usually makes debugging easier.
        参数:
        time - The time when to call method.
        prio - Priority of the event (to deterministically sequence events at the same time).
        method - The method to call at the given moment.

      • schedule

        public void schedule(java.lang.String description,
                     double time,
                     int prio,
                     java.lang.Runnable method)
        Schedules a call to method at a certain point in time.
        参数:
        description - Some description that is added as an additional parameter to the Event object (makes debugging easier).
        time - The time when to call method.
        prio - Priority of the event (to deterministically sequence events at the same time).
        method - The method to call at the given moment.

        prio - Priority of the event (to deterministically sequence events at the same time).

      • scheduleIn

        public void scheduleIn(double time,
                       int prio,
                       java.lang.Runnable method)
        Schedules a call to method in a certain amount of time. In contrast to schedule(double, int, Runnable) this method expects a relative time instead of an absolute one.

        Usually using scheduleIn(String, double, int, Runnable) should be preferred.

        参数:
        time - The time when to call method.
        prio - Priority of the event (to deterministically sequence events at the same time).
        method - The method to call at the given moment.

      • scheduleIn

        public void scheduleIn(java.lang.String description,
                       double time,
                       int prio,
                       java.lang.Runnable method)
        Schedules a call to method in a certain amount of time. In contrast to schedule(double, int, Runnable) this method expects a relative time instead of an absolute one.
        参数:
        description - Some description that is added as an additional parameter to the Event object (makes debugging easier).
        time - The time when to call method.
        prio - Priority of the event (to deterministically sequence events at the same time).
        method - The method to call at the given moment.

      • scheduleIn

        public void scheduleIn(java.time.Duration duration,
                       int prio,
                       java.lang.Runnable method)
        Schedules a call to method in a certain amount of time. In contrast to schedule(double, int, Runnable) this method expects a relative time specified by a Duration instead of an absolute one.

        Usually using scheduleIn(String, Duration, int, Runnable) should be preferred.

        参数:
        duration - The duration from the current simulation time when to call method.
        prio - Priority of the event (to deterministically sequence events at the same time).
        method - The method to call at the given moment.

      • scheduleIn

        prio - Priority of the event (to deterministically sequence events at the same time).

      • schedulePeriodically

        public void schedulePeriodically(double firstInvocation,
                                 double interval,
                                 int prio,
                                 java.util.function.BooleanSupplier method)
        Periodically calls a certain method. While this method returns true, a next invocation after the given time interval is scheduled.

      • schedulePeriodically

        public void schedulePeriodically(double firstInvocation,
                                 double interval,
                                 int prio,
                                 java.lang.Runnable method)
        Periodically calls a certain method until the simulation terminates.

      • scheduleProcess

        public void scheduleProcess(int prio,
                            java.util.function.DoubleSupplier method)
        Calls a certain method at the times returned by the method itself. The first invocation is performed at the current time (asynchronously, i.e., scheduleProcess() returns before method is called for the first time). Subsequent calls are scheduled at the absolute times returned by the previous method invocation. No more invocations are scheduled if method returned NaN or a negative value.

      • scheduleProcess

        public void scheduleProcess(double firstInvocation,
                            int prio,
                            java.util.function.DoubleSupplier method)
        Calls a certain method at the times returned by the method itself. The first invocation is performed at firstInvocation. Subsequent calls are scheduled at the absolute times returned by the previous method invocation. No more invocations are scheduled if method returned NaN or a negative value.

      • end

        public void end()
        After calling end() the simulation is terminated (after handling the current event).

      • pause

        public void pause()
        After calling pause() the simulation is paused. This means, the run() method returns after handling the current event.

      • unpause

        public void unpause()
        After calling pause() the simulation is paused. This means, the run() method returns after handling the current event.

      • checkState

                                 Simulation.SimExecState actual,
                                 Simulation.SimExecState expected)
        Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the actual state does not match the expected one.
        参数:
        operationName - Some description of the action that was attempted.
        actual - The current simulation state.
        expected - The expected simulation state.

      • simTime

        public double simTime()

      • simTimeToInstant

        public java.time.Instant simTimeToInstant()
        Converts the current simulation time to a Java Instant.
        另请参阅:
        simTimeToInstant(double)

      • simTimeToInstant

        public java.time.Instant simTimeToInstant(double simTime)
        Converts the given simulation time to a Java Instant (UTC time stamp). Conversion multiplies the time with the factor getSimTimeToMillisFactor() and rounds the results to the closest integer to get the number of milliseconds since a simTime of 0. This amount of milliseconds is then added to getSimTimeStartInstant() to get an absolute Java time stamp.
        另请参阅:
        setSimTimeStartInstant(Instant), setSimTimeToMillisFactor(long)

      • instantToSimTime

        public double instantToSimTime(java.time.Instant instant)
        Converts a given Java Instant (UTC time stamp) to the simulation time it corresponds to.
        参数:
        instant - The instant to be converted to simulation time.
        返回:
        The instant converted to simulation time.

      • durationToSimTime

        public double durationToSimTime(java.time.Duration d)
        Converts a given Java Duration to the corresponding simulation time.
        参数:
        d - The duration to be converted to simulation time.
        返回:
        The amount of simulation time.

      • print

        protected void print(Simulation.SimPrintMessage e)
        Prints a certain Simulation.SimPrintMessage by passing it to the registered print listeners.

      • trace

        public void trace(java.lang.Object... params)
        Produces a trace message (if there are any print listeners such as TraceFileProducer are registered that do something with such messages). A trace message consists of the simulation time and all parameters converted to Strings (separated by tabs).
        参数:
        params - The components of the trace message.

      • isTraceEnabled

        public boolean isTraceEnabled()
        返回:
        Whether or not trace messages are to be produced.

      • getPrintLevel

        public MsgCategory getPrintLevel()
        返回:
        The current maximum print message category.

      • setPrintLevel

        public void setPrintLevel(MsgCategory printLevel)
        Sets the maximum print message category to be forwared to the print listeners. If this is set to e.g. INFO, then only messages of the categories ERROR, WARN and INFO are forwared to
        参数:
        printLevel -

      • printFmt

        public void printFmt(MsgCategory category,
                     java.lang.String messageFormatString,
                     java.lang.Object... params)
        Triggers a print event of the given category with the message produced by a Java format String. If an appropriate listener is installed, this produces a message defined by the format string messageFormatString (used with the arguments given in params).

      • printFmt

        public void printFmt(java.lang.String messageFormatString,
                     java.lang.Object... params)
        Same as printFmt(MsgCategory, String, Object...), but defaulting to category INFO.

      • createEventQueue

        protected Simulation.EventQueue createEventQueue()
        Factory method to create a new event queue.
        返回:
        The event queue to use in this simulation.

      • setSimulationLength

        public void setSimulationLength(double simulationLength)
        Sets the maximum simulation time. A value of 0.0 means no such limit.

      • getSimulationLength

        public double getSimulationLength()
        返回:
        The maximum simulation time; a value of 0.0 means no such limit.

      • getRndStreamFactory

        public RandomFactory getRndStreamFactory()
        返回:
        The RandomFactory used to create random number streams.

      • setRndStreamFactory

        public void setRndStreamFactory(RandomFactory rndStreamFactory)
        Sets the random factory to use to create random number streams for stochastic simulations.

      • initRndGen

        public DblStream initRndGen(DblStream s,
                            java.lang.String streamName)
        Initializes the random number generator associated with the DblStream s. This just delegates to the RandomFactory of this simulation.

      • initRndGen

        public IntStream initRndGen(IntStream s,
                            java.lang.String streamName)
        Initializes the random number generator associated with the IntStream s. This just delegates to the RandomFactory of this simulation.

      • initRndGen

        public java.util.Random initRndGen(java.lang.String streamName)
        Creates an instance of Java's Random class initialized with a seed derived from the parameter streamName. This just delegates to the method RandomFactory.createInstance(String) of this simulation.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        返回:
        The name of this simulation.

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets a name for this simulation.

      • getRootComponent

        public SimComponentContainer<SimComponent> getRootComponent()
        返回:
        The root component of all SimComponents contained in the simulation.

      • setRootComponent

        protected void setRootComponent(SimComponentContainer<SimComponent> rootComponent)
        Sets the root component containing all permanent SimComponents contained in this simulation.
        参数:
        rootComponent - The new root component.

      • getInitialSimTime

        public double getInitialSimTime()

      • setInitialSimTime

        public void setInitialSimTime(double initialSimTime)
        Sets the initial value of the simulation clock.

      • getSimTimeStartInstant

        public java.time.Instant getSimTimeStartInstant()
        Returns the Instant corresponding to simulation time 0.
        另请参阅:
        setSimTimeStartInstant(Instant)

      • setSimTimeStartInstant

        public void setSimTimeStartInstant(java.time.Instant simTimeStartInstant)
        Sets the Instant corresponding to the a simulation time of 0. The default setting is to use the beginning of the current year.
        另请参阅:
        simTimeToInstant(double)

      • getSimTimeToMillisFactor

        public long getSimTimeToMillisFactor()
        Returns the factor used to convert the (double-valued) simulation time to milli-seconds since getSimTimeStartInstant().
        另请参阅:
        setSimTimeToMillisFactor(long)

      • getStatsResetTime

        public double getStatsResetTime()
        Returns the statistics reset time.

      • setStatsResetTime

        public void setStatsResetTime(double statsResetTime)
        Sets the time when to perform a statistics reset. The value set here will only have an effect before the simulation is started.
        参数:
        statsResetTime - The new statistics reset time.

      • setSimTimeToMillisFactor

        public void setSimTimeToMillisFactor(long simTimeToMillisFactor)
        Sets the factor used to convert the (double-valued) simulation time to milli-seconds since getSimTimeStartInstant(). The default value is 60*1000=60000, assuming simulation time to be in minutes.
        另请参阅:
        simTimeToInstant(double)

      • clone

        protected Simulation clone()
                    throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        覆盖:
        clone 在类中 java.lang.Object
        抛出:
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
